attribute.name: Description
attribute.value: Ball Valve, RF, Class 600, 2", FP, Trunnion, DIB-1, Lever Op, 316SS Trim, RTFE Seats, External Relief Kit, Body Drain Valve, -50F to 300F, NACE

attribute.name: Purchase Description
attribute.value:
ARC AML Brands: Balon, CSC, Frontier, Grove, GVS, KF, Meridian, Nutron, PBV, Velan, WKM, Worcester, GWC, Williams, Warren, C&C Enflow -Only acceptable for trunnion mounted valves JAG Only acceptable in the 'Internal spring loaded valves 1/2" and 3/4" spring loaded valves for sight glasses.
Minimum spec noted on description and material are a minimum requirement. Equivalent or better is acceptable upon client approval
Conditions: 1. All threaded end valves to be minimum 3000 psig rating with 2 or 3 piece threaded body construction (preferred). Bolted body is an acceptable alternative. 2. All SW end valves shall be minimum 3000 psig rating with 3 piece bolted body construction. 3. NPS 2 and above shall be bolted body construction. 4. All valves to have locking device/handles. 5. Soft seated valves shall be firesafe to API 607. 6. In Gas critical service DBB to be used. 7. In liquid critical service DIB1or DIB2 with some exceptions.

attribute.name: Description
attribute.value: Differential Pressure Transmitter, Foxboro IDP10S, 1/4" NPT Process Connection, Max Pressure: 3262 psi, Span Limit: 2.5 to 1000 inH2O, -49F to 185F, NACE

attribute.name: Purchase Description
attribute.value:
Foxboro IDP10S MODEL # IDP10S-TLLC01CD-L1(N) Aux Specs: MR-01
IDP10S: FUNCTION: Advanced Differential Pressure Transmitter Measures the Difference Between Two Pressures and Transmits a Proportional or Square Root (Flow) Electrical Signal. Accuracy Expressed as Percentage of Reading.
T - ELECTRONICS VERSION AND OUTPUT SIGNAL: HART & 4 To 20 mA
LL - STRUCTURE CODE: 316 ss LP1 Process Cover, 316L ss Sensor, Silicone Fill Fluid
C - SPAN LIMITS: 2.5 and 1000 inH2O; 0.625 and 250 kPa; 6.25 and 2500 mbar
0 - PROCESS CONNECTOR: (Matl Same As Process Cover),No Connectors, Both Covers Tapped For 1/4 NPT
1 - CONDUIT CONNECTION & HOUSING MATERIAL: 1/2 NPT Conduit Connection, Both Sides, Aluminum Housing
CD - ELECTRICAL SAFETY: CSA Zone Certified Flameproof Ex db IIC, Also Divisions Certified Explosionproof, Dust Ignition-proof.
L1 - OPTIONAL MODEL SUFFIX(ES) INCLUDED:
MR-01 - Accessories for IDP10, IMV30, IDP10S, IDP05S, IDP5 NACE MR0175 and NACE MR0103 Compliance Metallic process wetted parts of the instrument meet NACE MR0175 and NACE MR0103. Vent/drain screw and/or plug of biplanar transmitters may be changed to meet compliance. Includes a supplementary instrument tag stating compliance. Digital Indicator, Internal Pushbuttons, And Window Cover

attribute.value:
ARC AML Brands: Balon, CSC, Frontier, Grove, GVS, KF, Meridian, Nutron, PBV, Velan, WKM, Worcester, GWC, Williams, Warren, C&C Enflow -Only acceptable for trunnion mounted valves JAG Only acceptable in the 'Internal spring loaded valves 1/2" and 3/4" spring loaded valves for sight glasses.
Minimum spec noted on description and material are a minimum requirement. Equivalent or better is acceptable upon client approval
Conditions: 1. All threaded end valves to be minimum 3000 psig rating with 2 or 3 piece threaded body construction (preferred). Bolted body is an acceptable alternative. 2. All SW end valves shall be minimum 3000 psig rating with 3 piece bolted body construction. 3. NPS 2 and above shall be bolted body construction. 4. All valves to have locking device/handles. 5. Soft seated valves shall be firesafe to API 607. 6. In Gas critical service DBB to be used. 7. In liquid critical service DIB1or DIB2 with some exceptions.
